## Build.Interface interface

Build container service interface

Signature:

```typescript
export default interface Build extends Service
```

Extends: [Service](/api/bud-framework/service)

## Remarks

Generates a compiler config from

The most current config is accessible through . If has never been built before, accessing the property will automatically build it.

If the configuration has changed can be called to regenerate the configuration.

Most configuration values are produced using callbacks. They are keyed with strings starting `build/`. So, you could access the webpack entry with `bud.hooks.filter('build.entry')`

For typescript users who wish to maintain typing accuracy while adding support for various loaders, items and rules:

- should be declared by augmenting the interface

- should be declared by augmenting the interface

- should be declared by augmenting the interface

## Example 1

Access the config

```js
build.config;
```

## Example 2

Rebuild the configuration

```js
build.rebuild();
```

## Example 3

Filter the Webpack configuration.entry value

```js
bud.hooks.filter("build.entry");
```

## Properties

| Property                                              | Type                               | Description                                            |
| ----------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| [config](/api/bud-framework/build/interface/config)   | Webpack.Configuration              | Accesses the compiler configuration                    |
| [items](/api/bud-framework/build/interface/items)     | [Items](//bud-framework/items)     | array                                                  |
| [loaders](/api/bud-framework/build/interface/loaders) | [Loaders](//bud-framework/loaders) | array                                                  |
| [rules](/api/bud-framework/build/interface/rules)     | [Rules](//bud-framework/rules)     | [Rule/Interface](//bud-framework/rule/interface) array |

## Methods

| Method                                            | Description                   |
| ------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------- |
| [make()](/api/bud-framework/build/interface/make) | Make the configuration object |
